Package net.gree.asdk.api

Interface Summary
Achievement.AchievementChangeListener This is the listener to lock and unlock achievements.
Achievement.AchievementListUpdateListener This is the listener to receive the list of achievements.
GreePlatform.BadgeListener Listener called after every badge update.
GreeResourcesImpl This is an interface to implement other method for loading resource identifier.
GreeUser.GreeIgnoredUserListener Delivery of ignored users.
GreeUser.GreeUserListener Delivery of user results.
GreeUser.LogLabelValue implement this if you want to use the method GreeUser.logGreeUser(int index, int count, GreeUser[] users).
IconDownloadListener The callback interface that is used for icon downloading.
Leaderboard.LeaderboardListener Delivery leaderboard results.
Leaderboard.LogLabelValue Interface for receiving logging of object values.
Leaderboard.ScoreListener Delivery of array of score results.
Leaderboard.SuccessListener Delivery of pass/fail results, used when uploading or deleting a score for a leaderboard.
ModeratedText.ModeratedTextListener Delivery of array of moderated text results.
ModeratedText.SuccessListener Delivery of pass/fail results for moderatedText.
ScreenShot.SurfaceViewRenderer This is an interface for the Screenshot api in case you are using a SurfaceView.
 

Class Summary
Achievement Class representing one achievement
ConnectionChangeReceiver This class is implementing Android's BroadcastReceiver class for connection changes.
GreePlatform This class has a weak singleton pattern.
GreePlatformSettings This class is used to set or unset platform settings.
GreeUser Implements GreeUser API, a la OpenSocial People API.
Leaderboard Implements Gree Leaderboard API.
Leaderboard.Score the Score object hold one score for one user.
ModeratedText Implements GREE ModeratedText / Inspection API.
Request Class that provides a request with an OAuth signature.
ScreenShot This is class used to take screenshots.
ScreenShot.OpenGlRenderer Use this class if you want to implement your own drawToCanvas method, otherwise you can just use Screenshot.defaultGlRenderer.
